131191.<color_yellow>\nタロット合成の 説明です！\n<br>\nタロッ:
This is an explanation of the Tarot Synthesis. At the Tarot Table, two monster tarots can be combined to form a new tarot.
The new Tarot will inherit the Arcana of the two Tarots used as ingredients and the race of the monster...I need you to choose two tarots to use as materials.

145069.タロットテーブルは\n不思議な光を たたえている……。\n<br>\n<colo:
The tarot table is casting a strange light...This tarot table allows you to combine two monster tarots or change one of the arcana of your choice. In order to use the Tarot Table,
you must be a fortune teller of at least level 40 before you can see Babylon the Tarot Maker...

145070.タロットを ２枚以上所持していないため\n合成できません。タロット合成をするには:
You must have have at least 2 Tarots in your
possession to perform synthesis.<end>

145071.材料にできる タロットが\nなくなりました。\n<end>: You don't have any more Tarots to use.<end>

146754.ランクが ＳＳ以上のタロットです。\n合成の材料に使って\n本当に よろしいです:
Are you sure you like to use an SS+ Rank
Tarot as a material for synthesis?<yesno 2><close>

150143.タロットが これ以上 少なくなると\nデッキを組むことが できなくなります。\n:
If you use too many Tarots in synthesis, you
won't have enough to build a deck to use in
battle. Proceed anyways?<yesno 2><close>

279386.<color_yellow>\nタロットテーブルで 新たに アルカナを\n替える:
The Tarot Table now offers a new option to change the Arcana... By selecting "Change Arcana", you can change the Arcana of one
Tarot card in your hand to any Arcana... This function does not consume any Tarot, so feel free to try it out...
